definition: to hang or suspend (from a hook etc)/to hang up (the phone)/(of a line) to be dead/to be worried or concerned/to make a phone call (dialect)/to register or record/classifier for sets or clusters of objects/(slang) to kill/to die/to be finished/to fail (an exam)
axis/axle/spool (for thread)/roller (for scrolls)/classifier for calligraphy rolls etc
see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]/Taiwan pr. [zhou2]
acrylic (loanword)/see also 亞克力|亚克力[ya4 ke4 li4]
Shōsō-in, treasure house belonging to Tōdai-ji 東大寺, Nara 奈良, Japan, an extensive repository of imperial treasures from Tang times/described as the east-most end of the Silk road
to call for entries and select the best/to solicit (entries, submissions, applications etc)/to select (the best candidate)/contest/competition
kesi or k’o-ssu, Chinese silk tapestry woven in a pictorial design

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Guo2 jia1 Bo2 wu4 guan3

definition: vertical scroll (painting or calligraphy)/vertical shaft (of a machine)
